name: Sanctuary's Fall
description:
The unveiled backstory of Celeste Alinac from the Everhaze franchise, and how she truly came to be stranded in the sky. 

Web controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Z to interact.

Sanctuary's Fall was created by J Scherrer. The Everhaze world was created by J Scherrer, Connor Zielinski, Darcy Hayes, Christen Niedzielski, and Tommy Bozzelli.

Made in GBStudio.
